products.metadescription: Made to Measure Porcelain White Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo Porcelain White Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Palate Lace White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Palate Lace White
products.productdescription: The Palate Lace White is one of the whitest fabrics in our blackout roller blind range. Suitable for neutral environments or locations that need a bit of purity. Being a Blackout blind makes this is perfect for bedrooms to get a great nights sleep without the worry if light seeping through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Fuji Silk Snow Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The fuji silk snow roller blind will blend seamlessly into your interior with its gentle neutral cream colour, while also adding a gorgeous texture to your window with its silky fabric.
products.productdescription: The fuji silk snow roller blind will blend seamlessly into your interior with its gentle neutral cream colour, while also adding a gorgeous texture to your window with its silky fabric. This blind is very versatile and can be paired in many different ways to create a modern, sophisticated interior.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind has a beautiful shot-silk effec running across the fabric - perfect for adding some textured style to your window. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Amor White Lotus with Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Amor White Lotus with Haze Pure Double Roller Blind Combining two of our most popular roller blinds in one, this Amor White Lotus and Haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, th
products.productdescription: Combining two of our most popular roller blinds in one, this Amor White Lotus and Haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout Amor soft grey to block out the light.  Our double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Lower the voile fabric to give your home the daytime privacy you require. Gently filtering the light and preventing people from seeing in, this blind is ideal for those who don't want to be overlooked.

products.title: Ritz Bright White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Ritz Bright White Roller Blind
products.productdescription: This blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Pura White Voile Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The Pura White voile blind has a soft uniform weave to it, and is one of the purest white sheer blind we offer in our range. With a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside woode
products.productdescription: The Pura White voile blind has a soft uniform weave to it, and is one of the purest white sheer blind we offer in our range. With a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Voile blinds, also known as sheer blinds, are a great way to give your home privacy whilst still letting the daylight in. The sheer fabric is thin and delicate and will give your room privacy from anyone looking in.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.
